wikipedia_page.main: Michael Evans (born 3 August 1946, in West Bromwich) is an English former footballer who played as a full back in the Football League for Walsall, Swansea City and Crewe Alexandra. He then played for a number of non-league clubs including Worcester City, Stourbridge, Stafford Rangers, Halesowen Town and Rushall Olympic, and has scouted for various Midlands clubs.
